mapper.sql: id, uuid, image_group_id, file_path, kind, replace_pod_id, replace_old_parent_id, if_delete_parent, parent_name, real_name, namespace, api_version, resource_version, update_time, status
mapper.select:
select
from v2_pod where image_group_id = #{imageGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != "Deleted" limit 0,1

select
from v2_pod t1 where t1.image_group_id = ( select t2.id from v2_image_group t2 where t2.real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t2.version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 0,1 ) and status != "Deleted" limit 0,1

select
from v2_pod order by resource_version desc limit 1
